attributes.action: STOP/Freeze  all Council tax payments during the COVID19 pandemic
attributes.additional_details: It is only right that council tax is froze or stopped as increase from last year is not adequate. Also during a pandemic where many are being made redundnat and concerneded about other necessities counil tax should be not implemented.
attributes.background: The government needs to freeze all council tax payments as those who  have recieved council tax notices have seen stark increase from last year. During a pandemic many are being laid off and thus can not afford to pay this. Money should be spent on basic necessities rather than Council tax.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
